member.name: SpatialAudioHrtfDirectivityType
member.summary: Specifies the shape in which sound is emitted by an .

member.name: SpatialAudioHrtfDirectivityType.SpatialAudioHrtfDirectivity_OmniDirectional
member.summary: The sound is emitted in all directions.

member.name: SpatialAudioHrtfDirectivityType.SpatialAudioHrtfDirectivity_Cardioid
member.summary: The sound is emitted in a cardioid shape.

member.name: SpatialAudioHrtfDirectivityType.SpatialAudioHrtfDirectivity_Cone
member.summary: The sound is emitted in a cone shape.
